data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

You always begin your journey facing forward. This also happens as you walk forward and backward. There are two examples of directions: Forward / Left. The instructions are very specific to that direction. Take 9 left steps forward. The left / right instruction makes no mention of walking backward or forward to the beginning. So, the answer is No.
